White Labs WLP029 German Ale/K\u00f6lsch: White Labs WLP029 German Ale/Kölsch, Wyeast WY2565 Kölsch, or Fermentis SafAle K-97

1: Heat 6 gallons of water to 70C and shut off the heat.
2: Add the extract, mixing completely until dissolved.
3: Boil for 60 minutes, adding hops and Whirlfloc (or Irish moss) according to the schedule
7: Chill to about 16°C, aerate well, and pitch the yeast
9: allowing the temperature to rise to 20°C after 2 or 3 days
10: When fermentation is complete, crash to 2°C and hold there for 2 or 3 weeks
11: To toast the coconut, spread on a cookie sheet and bake at 300°F (150°C) for 15 minutes or until lightly brown. Allow to cool completely.
12: Then you put the lime in the coconut (i.e., combine the zest and toasted coconut) in a mesh bag or “hop sock” and steep in the fermentor
13: Taste the beer after 3 days and again every 2 days until it tastes how you like it
14: Remove the coconut/lime and package, carbonate, and enjoy
